page.title: 04A typical Saturday
page.content: I wake up at seven o'clock ,read till 7.15 ,then I get up and go downstairs. I get dressed and go out side where I feed the calves with water,hay and cake and let the cow in.When I have fed the chicks I go in for breakfast at about 8 o'clock.Then Dad and I go out to milk the cow and at nine o'clock my friends Andrew and Stephen come. We play some games, then Stephen and Andrew have to go home for dinner. we have dinner at one o'clock. After dinner when they come back we make a go-cart and play or go with Dad.After they've gone home we have tea at about five o'clock .After tea we watch T.V. then my brother and sister go to bed at 8 0'clock.I go with Dad and feed the calves and play with them a bit,then I go in and watch television before having a bath. At 8.45 I go to bed. S.A.Price
